name: Charred Corn Tacos in Crispy All-Cheese Taco Shells
description: Charred corn with salsa verde in a crisp all-cheese taco shell.
totalTime: 5 minutes (once taco shells and esquites are made)
recipeYield: Makes 8 mini tacos, serving 2 to 3 as a light meal, or 8 as an hors d'oeuvres
recipeIngredient: 1 recipe Basic Salsa Verde (or store-bought salsa verde)

recipeInstructions.text: Fill taco shells with esquites and top with salsa verde. Serve.
